alert.note: Alert for Archer; Baylor; Clay; Foard; Hardeman; Knox; Wichita; Wilbarger (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 08 at 2:50PM CDT until April 09 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...CRITICAL FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS EXPECTED... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR BREEZY NORTHWEST WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR WESTERN OKLAHOMA AND NORTHERN TEXAS... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 9 PM CDT SATURDAY FOR BREEZY SOUTH WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR WESTERN OKLAHOMA AND NORTHERN TEXAS...... The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from noon to 9 PM CDT Saturday. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * TIMING...Today and Saturday. * WINDS...Northwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts 30 to 40 mph today. Southwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts 30 to 40 mph on Saturday. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...Today, 10 to 15 percent. Saturday, 8 to 18 percent. * TEMPERATURES...For today, low 60s to near 70 degrees. For Saturday, middle to upper 80s.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures will contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Archer; Baylor; Clay; Foard; Hardeman; Knox; Wichita; Wilbarger
